title: 2 Airline Stocks That Are Poised to Rise, According to an Analyst
text:
2 Airline Stocks That Are Poised to Rise, According to an Analyst

Text size

Company Here; Stock; Barronâ??s Uncredited

Airline stocks have been all over the map this year, but Macquarie thinks that there’s more runway ahead for both one of the best performers in the group and one of the worst.

The back story. It has been an interesting year for airline investors. Companies like Delta Air Lines (ticker: DAL) have risen more than 20% in 2019, helped by strong earnings and the fact that they weren’t hurt by the continuing grounding of Boeing ’s (BA) 737 MAX aircraft.

Stock in American Airlines Group (AAL), another so-called legacy carrier, is firmly in the red. The shares have been hurt by lackluster earnings, debt worries, and the rescheduling headaches that have come from its reliance on the grounded Boeing planes.
description: Macquarie upgraded both Southwest Airlines and Spirit Airlines on Friday.
